failed-confirm-known.title: Images that failed to confirm a known relationship
failed-confirm-known.query: MATCH (f:Image)--(ff:frick)-[:known]-(zz:zeri)--(z:Image) WHERE not(ff--(:Image)-[:match]-(:Image)--zz) RETURN distinct f,z

frick-frick.title: Frick-Frick Matches
frick-frick.query: MATCH (aa:Artwork)--(a:frick)-[:match]-(c:frick)--(cc:Artwork) WHERE not(aa=cc) and id(a) < id(c) RETURN distinct a, c

zeri-zeri.title: Zeri-Zeri Matches
zeri-zeri.query: MATCH (aa:Artwork)--(a:zeri)-[:match]-(c:zeri)--(cc:Artwork) WHERE not(aa=cc) and id(a) < id(c) RETURN distinct a, c
